name: Chicken Hunters
description:
The Infamous Swarm of Evil Chickens has come back once more to prey on innocent Worms, as a law abiding Hunter/Farmer it is your duty to protect the Citizens of this Land. Take Arms and Get Ready To Have a Fight to Death!!!

Your Hunters are Linked Together and can only move on Symmetrical Directions, Press Left click on Screen and Drag to Swerve them to be able to Kill all the Chickens.

Mohammad Hadi RabbaniNezhad - Programming and Level Design

Pouyan ShekariKiani  - Programming and Level Design

Mohammad Ali Hasanpour - Art and Music
